Uses of Package
parallel

  • Packages that use parallel 
    Package Description
    analysis
    analysis package: a package implementing parallel algorithms for numerical differentiation and integration, and also including more complex transformations such as convolution.
    graph
    graph package: a collection of classes for representing graphs, hyper-graphs and algorithms operating on such discrete finite structures.
    graph.coarsening
    package defines abstract classes and implements algorithms for coarsening graphs.
    graph.packing
    Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.
    parallel
    parallel package: an implementation of all the synchronization, communication & coordination primitives required in popt4jlib.
    parallel.distributed
    Extends the basic functionality found in the parallel package over many remote JVMs distributed over a network of machines.
    popt4jlib
    popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.NumberPartitioning
    Package defines parallel/distributed versions of well-known Number Partitioning algorithms.
    popt4jlib.PS
    Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    tests
    tests package: defines functions used for testing the optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib library.

  • Classes in parallel used by graph.packing 
    Class and Description
    FasterParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor
    A faster class that implements thread-pooling to allow its users to execute concurrently a batch of tasks implementing the TaskObject, or more simply, the Runnable interface.
    ParallelException 
  • Classes in parallel used by parallel 
    Class and Description
    Barrier
    A class implementing the Barrier concept in parallel/distributed computing.
    BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator
    The BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that implements the rendevouz mechanism in parallel programming.
    BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator
    The BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another Singleton class that implements the rendevouz mechanism in parallel programming.
    ComparableTaskObject
    empty interface for use with dynamic, priority-based task msg-passing coordinators and executors.
    ComplexBarrier
    A class implementing the Barrier concept in parallel/distributed computing.
    DMCoordinator
    Title: Thread Coordination Management System
    FairDMCoordinator
    Title: Thread Coordination Management System
    Lock
    Standard Lock mechanism for thread coordination.
    MsgPassingCoordinator
    The MsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
    OrderedBarrier
    Title: popt4jlib
    ParallelException 
    ParallelExceptionUnsubmittedTasks
    encapsulates any unsubmitted tasks to executors.
    SimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator
    The SimpleFasterMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
    SimplePriorityMsgPassingCoordinator
    The SimplePriorityMsgPassingCoordinator class: yet another class that allows sending and receiving (synchronous and asynchronous) data between threads.
    TaskObject
    interface defining what a TaskObject must support.
